name: Headspace
summary: Meditation and mindfulness app with guided sessions
description: Headspace is your guide to mindfulness for your everyday life. Learn meditation and mindfulness skills from world-class experts, with hundreds of guided meditations, sleep sounds, and focus music.

sections.title: About Headspace
sections.text: Headspace teaches you the life-changing skills of meditation and mindfulness in just a few minutes a day. Find hundreds of sessions on physical health, personal growth, stress management, and sleep.

sections.title: Key Features
sections.text:
• Guided meditations for beginners and experts
• Sleep sounds and sleepcasts
• Focus music to improve concentration
• Mindful movement and yoga
• SOS exercises for moments of crisis
• Progress tracking and streaks

sections.title: Evidence Base
sections.text: Headspace has been clinically validated through multiple research studies. Studies show it can reduce stress by 14% in just 10 days and improve focus and compassion.

sections.title: Pricing
sections.text: Free: Basics course and limited content. Paid: $12.99/month or $69.99/year. Family plan available. Student discount available. Free for some healthcare workers and teachers.
